attributes.action: Consider Statutory Regulation of  Vice Chancellor's Pay
attributes.additional_details:
We have stumbled upon a new generation- "Generation 9k"

With fees rising, funding slashed and cost of living going up: more and more people are finding it difficult to gain access to tertiary education. This is all while the Vice Chancellor's of universities and Chief Executive's of colleges give themselves obscene pay rises.

 We the undersigned petition the UK Government to consider the following:

- Launching a review into the unacceptable pay rises of university VC's and college CE's

- Consider imposing statutory regulation by means of an independent body of pay and benefits given to Vice Chancellor's and Chief Executives at institutes of further and higher education.
